mapper.select: select r.id, r.product_id as `productId`, r.customer_id as `customerId`, r.content, r.rating, c.name as 'name' from review r, customer_info c where r.product_id=#{id} and r.customer_id = c.id order by id desc;
mapper.insert: insert into review(product_id, customer_id, content, rating) values(#{productId}, #{customerId}, #{content}, #{rating})
